Goal: 13: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
Target:
13.1 Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural 
disasters in all countries
Indicator:
13.1.1: Number of states with strategies for enhancing adaptive capacity and dealing with 
climate extreme weather events
Desc:
The indicator highlights the number of States and Union Territories in India who have 
prepared their State Action Plan on Climate Change (SAPCC) in order to enable themselves 
to address existing as well as future climate change and reduce the associated risks and 
vulnerabilities. The framework for SAPCC includes three main components: 
a) Climate profile of the state 
b) Climate change strategy 
c) Climate change action plan
Source: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
